item.title: Acoustic guitar and avant-garde orchestral music unite
item.author: Camilla Nicholson,
item.description: The Barbican Monday 11th April Little Scream opened the show for José González with The Göteborg String Theory. A fairly unknown artist; at first shy and inverted, and very much in front of a judging panel as I doubt many of us in the audience had come for her – but who, immediately, grabbed our …
